resources.string: Enter your firstname and lastname, then click the button to proceed.\n\nYou may also use the toolbar icons or navigation menu.
Please enter your name to continue.
Use the button labeled "RE-ROLL" to get a new randomized NASA image.\n\nThe button labeled "SAVE" will save the displayed image to the devices image directory.
Are you sure you want to re-roll this image?
You are already in the randomizer.

The gallery displays all images saved in the NASA photo randomizer.

 Tap on the images to view their save path.

In the future delete functionality will be added.
You are already in the gallery.
Who is using the app today?
